mapper.select: select dongCode, sidoName from dongcode where right(dongcode, 8) = '00000000';
select dongCode, gugunName from dongcode where left(dongcode, 2) = left(#{sidoCode}, 2) and right(dongcode, 5) = '00000' and gugunName is not null;
select dongCode, dongName from dongcode where left(dongcode, 5) = left(#{gugunCode}, 5) and dongName is not null;
select dongName from dongcode where left(dongcode, 8) = left(#{Code}, 8) and dongName is not null;
